job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt en onderhoudt ook data pipelines & werkt mee aan onze web applicaties.

job_tasks.phrase: Modellen die voorspellen welke advertentie banner/creative het meest geschikt is voor een online bezoeker
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of predictive models for ad suitability, a core ML task.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor most likely converters/clickers van advertentie campagnes
job_tasks.justification: This refers to building predictive models to identify likely converters/clickers, a classic ML task.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor het voorspellen van leeftijd en gender van DPG Media online bezoekers obv geconsumeerde content
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of predictive models for user attribute prediction based on content consumption, a traditional ML task.

job_tasks.phrase: Toevoegen van profile enrichments in batch & real-time flows in een big data environment
job_tasks.justification: This task involves data engineering for profile enrichment in batch and real-time flows within a big data environment.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: This refers to building data pipelines and dashboards for monitoring and alerting, which falls under data engineering and management.

job_tasks.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of analyzing requirements, experimenting with models, implementing, and presenting results, which are integrated software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions building data stacks and pipelines, which is a data engineering task.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to DevOps practices, including infra-as-code and CI/CD, which are part of MLOps.

job_tasks.justification: This task involves building out an ML Ops platform, which falls under operations and MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: This describes integrating services with other teams, a core software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership of models, jobs, and applications is a software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: 80% is bouwen aan de data stack, web applicaties & incrementele verbeteringen

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-week)
soft_skills.justification: Participation in scrum ceremonies indicates collaboration and communication within a team.

soft_skills.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
soft_skills.justification: Presenting results to development and business teams requires communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: you build it, you run it mentaliteit
soft_skills.justification: The 'build it, run it' mentality signifies ownership and responsibility for the developed components.

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly states taking ownership and accountability, which aligns with the Innovation & Ownership category.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes traditional ML tasks such as building predictive models for advertising suitability, converters, and user attributes. While there are software engineering tasks (building data pipelines, web applications, MLOps platform, integration), the core focus of the model development is on traditional ML, not Generative AI. The distribution of tasks leans towards both software engineering (Macro-Category A) and ML specialization (Macro-Category B), but the specialization is in traditional ML, fitting the 'Core ML Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the types of models being developed (predictive models for various advertising-related tasks) and the technologies used. The responsibilities are well-defined, allowing for a confident classification of the role as a traditional ML Engineer with strong software engineering components.
